mapper.select: select ckey,accession_number as AccessionNumber,status,study_instance_uid as StudyInstanceUID from movetask where status=#{status} order by ckey limit 10

select ckey,study_instance_uid as AccessionNumber,status,study_instance_uid as StudyInstanceUID,patient_id as patientid,department_mode as Modality from movetask where status=#{status} and exam_status in('EXAMED','REPORT_PUB') and qrcode is not null and length(qrcode)>0 and pay_status='Y' order by ckey limit 10
select ckey,accession_number as AccessionNumber,qrcode,patient_id as patientid,department_mode as Modality from movetask where status='MOVE_SUCCESS' order by ckey limit 1
select ckey,accession_number as AccessionNumber,qrcode,patient_id as patientid,department_mode as Modality from movetask where status='ZIP_SUCCESS' order by ckey limit 1

select ckey,report_id,report_path from movetask where status='FILE_MOVE_SUCCESS' and pay_status='Y' and exam_status='REPORT_PUB' and report_id is not null and report_id!='' and report_path is not null and report_path!='' order by ckey limit 1
select ckey,accession_number,status,study_instance_uid from movetask where status in ('MOVE_START','MOVE_PENDING') and timestampdiff(MINUTE,startMoveTime,current_timestamp)>12 order by ckey limit 100
mapper.update: update movetask set status=#{status} where ckey=#{ckey}
